analyzed: rab 'byor 'di la dngos po yod pa yang med /
translated: Subhūti, in this regard, there is no existence of things,

analyzed: dngos po med pa yang med /
translated: there is no nonexistence of things,

analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyang med /
